original: daśa-gītikā-pāda
analyzed: daśagītikā pāda

original: AB 1.1a/ @praṇipatya %ekam anekam kam satyām devatām param brahma/
analyzed: ab praṇipatya ekam anekam kam satyām devatām param brahma

original: AB_1.1c/ āryabhaṭas %trīṇi @gadati gaṇitam kāla-kriyām golam//
analyzed: āryabhaṭaḥ trīṇi gadati gaṇitam kālakriyām golam

original: AB_1.2a/ varga-akṣarāṇi varge avarge avarga-akṣarāṇi kāt $ṅmau $yas/
analyzed: varga akṣarāṇi varge a varge a varga akṣarāṇi kāt ṅ mau yas

original: AB_1.2c/ kha-%dvi-%navake svarās %nava varge avarge %nava antya-varge vā//
analyzed: kha dvi navake svarāḥ nava varge avarge nava antyavarge vā

original: AB_1.3a/ yuga-ravi-bha-gaṇās $khyughṛ śaśi $cayagiyiṅuśuchlṛ ku $ṅiśibuṇḷṣkhṛ prāk/
analyzed: yuga ra vi bha ga ṇāḥ khyu ghṛ śa śi caya giyi ṅu śu chlṛ ku ṅi śi buṇ ḷṣ khṛ prāk

original: AB_1.3c/ śani $ḍhuṅvighva guru $khricyubha kuja $bhadlijhnukhṛ bhṛgu-budha-saurās//
analyzed: śani ḍhuṅ vighva guru khri cyubha kuja bhadli jhnu khṛ bhṛgu budha saurāḥ

original: AB_1.4a/ candra-ucca $rjuṣkhidha budha $suguśithṛna bhṛgu $jaṣabikhuchṛ śeṣa arkās/
analyzed: candra aucca ṛjuṣkhidha budha sugu śithṛna bhṛgu jaṣa bikhuchṛ śeṣa arkās

original: AB_1.4c/ $buphinaca pāta-vilomās budha-ahni aja-arka-udayāt ca laṅkāyām//
analyzed: buphina ca pāta vilomāḥ budha ahni aja arka odayāt ca laṅkāyām

original: AB_1.5a/ ka-ahas manavas $ḍha manu-yugās $śkha gatās te ca manu-yugās $chnā ca/
analyzed: kaahas manavaḥ ḍha manu yugāḥ śkha gatāḥ te ca manu yugāḥ chnā ca

original: AB_1.5c/ kalpa-ādes yuga-pādās $ga ca guru-divasāt ca bhāratāt pūrvam//
analyzed: kalpa ādeḥ yuga pādās ga ca gurudivasāt ca bhāratāt pūrvam

original: AB_1.6a/ śaśi-rāśayas $ṭha cakram te aṃśa-kalā-yojanāni $yavaña-guṇās/
analyzed: śaśirāśayaḥ cakram te aṃśakalā yojanāni

original: AB_1.6c/ prāṇena @eti kalām bham kha-yuga-aṃśe graha-javas bha-$va-aṃśe arkas//
analyzed: prāṇena eti kalām bham kha yuga aṃśe graha javas bhava aṃśe arkas

original: AB_1.7a/ nṛ-$ṣi yojanam $ñilā bhū-vyāsas arka-indvor $ghriñā $giṇa $ka meros/
analyzed: nṛṣi yojanam ñilā bhū vyāsaḥ arka aindvoḥ ghriñā giṇa ka meroḥ

original: AB_1.7c/ bhṛgu-guru-budha-śani-bhaumās śaśi-$ṅa-$ña-$ṇa-$na-$ma-aṃśakās sama-arka-samās//
analyzed: bhṛgu guru budha śani bhaumāḥ śaśi ṅañ aṇa nama aṃśakāḥ sama arka samāḥ

original: AB_1.8a/ $bha-apakramas graha-aṃśās śaśi-vikṣepas apamaṇḍalāt $jha-%ardham/
analyzed: bha apakramas graha aṃśās śaśi vikṣepas apa maṇḍalāt jha ardham

original: AB_1.8c/ śani-guru-kuja $kha-$ka-$ga-%ardham bhṛgu-budha $kha $sca-aṅgulas $gha-hastas $nā//
analyzed: śani guru kuja kha ka ga ardham bhṛgu budha kha sca aṅgulas gha hastas nā

original: AB_1.9a/ budha-bhṛgu-kuja-guru-śani $na-$va-$rā-$ṣa-$ha @gatvā aṃśakān %prathama-pātās/
analyzed: budha bhṛgu kuja guru śani nava rāṣaha gatvā aṃśakān prathama pātāḥ

original: AB_1.9c/ savitur amīṣām ca tathā $dvā-$ñakhi-$sā-$hdā-$hlya-$khicya manda-uccam//
analyzed: savituḥ amīṣām ca tathā manda auccam

original: AB_1.10a/ $jha-%ardhāni manda-vṛttam śaśinas $cha $ga-$cha-$gha-$ḍha-$cha-$jha yathā uktebhyas/
analyzed: jha ardhāni mandavṛttam śaśinaḥ cha gacha ghaḍha chajha yathā uktebhyas

original: AB_1.10c/ $jhā-$gḍa-$glā-$rdha-$dḍa tathā śani-guru-kuja-bhṛgu-budha-ucca-śīghrebhyas//
analyzed: tathā śani guru kuja bhṛgu budha aucca śīghrebhyaḥ

original: AB_1.11a/ mandāt $ṅa-$kha-$da-$ja-$ḍā vakriṇām %dvitīye pade %caturthe ca/
analyzed: mandāt ṅa kha da jaḍāḥ vakriṇām dvitīye pade caturthe ca

original: AB_1.11c/ $jā-$ṇa-$kla-$chla-$jhna uccāt śīghrāt $giyiṅaśa ku-vāyu-kakṣyā-antyā//
analyzed: uccāt śīghrāt giyiṅaśa ku vāyu kakṣyā antyā

original: AB_1.12a/ $makhi $bhaki $phakhi $dhakhi $ṇakhi $ñakhi $ṅakhi $hasjha $skaki $kiṣga $śghaki $kighva/
analyzed: makhi bhaki phakhi dhakhi ṇakhi ñakhi ṅakhi hasjha skaki kiṣga śghaki kighva

original: AB_1.12c/ $ghlaki $kigra $hakya $dhaki $kica $sga $jhaśa $ṅva $kla $pta $pha $cha kalā-%ardha-jyās//
analyzed: ghlaki kigra hakya dhaki kica sga jha śa ṅva kla pta pha cha kalā ardha jyā

original: AB_1.13a/ %daśa-gītika-sūtram idam bhū-graha-caritam bha-pañjare @jñātvā/
analyzed: daśagītika sūtram idam bhū graha caritam bha pañjare jñātvā

original: AB_1.13c/ graha-bha-gaṇa-paribhramaṇam sas @yāti @bhittvā param brahma//
analyzed: graha bhagaṇa paribhramaṇam saḥ yāti bhittvā param brahma

original: gaṇita-pāda
analyzed: gaṇitapāda

original: AB 2.1a/ brahma-ku-śaśi-budha-bhṛgu-ravi-kuja-guru-koṇa-bha-gaṇān @namas-kṛtya/
analyzed: brahma ku śaśi budha bhṛgu ravi kuja guru koṇa bhagaṇān namaskṛtya

original: AB_2.1c/ āryabhaṭas tu iha @nigadati kusuma-pure abhyarcitam jñānam//
analyzed: ārya bhaṭaḥ tu iha nigadati kusumapure abhyarcitam jñānam

original: AB_2.2a/ %ekam %daśa ca %śatam ca %sahasram %ayuta-%niyute tathā %prayutam/
analyzed: ekam daśa ca śatam ca sahasram ayutaniyute tathā prayutam

original: AB_2.2c/ %koṭi-%arbudam ca %vṛndam sthānāt sthānam %daśa-guṇam @syāt//
analyzed: koṭiarbudam ca vṛndam sthānāt sthānam daśaguṇam syāt

original: AB_2.3a/ vargas sama-%catur-aśras phalam ca sadṛśa-%dvayasya saṃvargas/
analyzed: vargas sama caturaśraḥ phalam ca sadṛśa dvayasya saṃvargaḥ

original: AB_2.3c/ sadṛśa-%traya-saṃvargas ghanas tathā %dvādaśa-aśris @syāt//
analyzed: sadṛśa traya saṃvargaḥ ghanaḥ tathā dvādaśa aśriḥ syāt

original: AB_2.4a/ bhāgam @haret avargān nityam %dvi-guṇena varga-mūlena/
analyzed: bhāgam haret avargāt nityam dviguṇena vargamūlena

original: AB_2.4c/ vargāt varge śuddhe labdham sthāna-antare mūlam//
analyzed: vargāt varge śuddhe labdham sthāna antare mūlam

original: AB_2.5a/ aghanāt @bhajet %dvitīyāt %tri-guṇena ghanasya mūla-vargeṇa/
analyzed: aghanāt bhajet dvitīyāt triguṇena ghanasya mūlavargeṇa

original: AB_2.5c/ vargas %tri-pūrva-guṇitas śodhyas %prathamāt ghanas ca ghanāt//
analyzed: vargaḥ tri pūrva guṇitas śodhyas prathamāt ghanaḥ ca ghanāt

original: AB_2.6a/ %tri-bhujasya phala-śarīram sama-dala-koṭī-bhujā-%ardha-saṃvargas/
analyzed: tribhujasya phala śarīram

original: AB_2.6c/ ūrdhva-bhujā-tad-saṃvarga-%ardham sas ghanas %ṣaṣ-aśris iti//
analyzed: sas ghanas iti

original: AB_2.7a/ sama-pariṇāhasya-%ardham viṣkambha-%ardha-hatam eva vṛtta-phalam/
analyzed: sama pariṇāhasya ardham viṣkambha ardha hatam eva vṛtta phalam

original: AB_2.7c/ tad-nija-mūlena hatam ghana-gola-phalam niravaśeṣam//
analyzed: tad nija mūlena hatam ghana gola phalam niravaśeṣam

original: AB_2.8a/ āyāma-guṇe pārśve tad-yoga-hṛte sva-pāta-lekhe/
analyzed: āyāma guṇe pārśve tad yoga hṛte sva pāta lekhe

original: AB_2.8c/ vistara-yoga-%ardha-guṇe jñeyam kṣetra-phalam āyāme//
AB_2.9a/ sarveṣām kṣetrāṇām @prasādhya pārśve phalam tad-abhyāsas/
analyzed: sarveṣām kṣetrāṇām prasādhya pārśve phalam tad abhyāsaḥ

original: AB_2.9c/ paridhes %ṣaṣ-bhāga-jyā viṣkambha-%ardhena sā tulyā//
analyzed: paridheḥ ṣaṣ bhāga jyā viṣkambha ardhena sā tulyā

original: AB_2.10a/ %catur-adhikam %śatam %aṣṭa-guṇam %dvāṣaṣṭis tathā %sahasrāṇām/
analyzed: catur adhikam śatam aṣṭaguṇam dvāṣaṣṭiḥ tathā sahasrāṇām

original: AB_2.10c/ %ayuta-%dvaya-viṣkambhasya āsannas vṛtta-pariṇāhas//
analyzed: ayuta dvaya viṣkambhasya āsannaḥ vṛtta pariṇāhaḥ

original: AB_2.11a/ sama-vṛtta-paridhi-pādam @chindyāt %tri-bhujāt %catur-bhujāt ca eva/
analyzed: sama vṛtta paridhi pādam chindyāt tri bhujāt catur bhujāt ca eva

original: AB_2.11c/ sama-cāpa-jyā-%ardhāni tu viṣkambha-%ardhe yathā iṣṭāni//
analyzed: sama cāpa jyā ardhāni tu viṣkambha ardhe yathā iṣṭāni

original: AB_2.12a/ %prathamāt cāpa-jyā-%ardhāt yair ūnam khaṇḍitam %dvitīya-%ardham/
analyzed: prathamāt cāpa jyā ardhāt yaiḥ ūnam khaṇḍitam dvitīya ardham

original: AB_2.12c/ tad-%prathama-jyā-%ardha-aṃśais tais tais ūnāni śeṣāṇi//
analyzed: tad prathama jyā ardha aṃśaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ ūnāni śeṣāṇi

original: AB_2.13a/ vṛttam bhrameṇa sādhyam ca %catur-bhujam ca karṇābhyām/
analyzed: vṛttam bhrameṇa sādhyam ca caturbhujam ca karṇābhyām

original: AB_2.13c/ sādhyā jalena sama-bhūs adhas-ūrdhvam lambakena eva//
analyzed: sādhyā jalena samabhūs adhasūrdhvam lambakena eva

original: AB_2.14a/ śaṅkos pramāṇa-vargam chāyā-vargeṇa saṃyutam @kṛtvā/
analyzed: śaṅkoḥ pramāṇavargam chāyāvargeṇa saṃyutam kṛtvā

original: AB_2.14c/ yat tasya varga-mūlam viṣkambha-%ardham sva-vṛttasya//
analyzed: yat tasya varga mūlam viṣkambha ardham sva vṛttasya

original: AB_2.15a/ śaṅku-guṇam śaṅku-bhujā-vivaram śaṅku-bhujayor viśeṣa-hṛtam/
analyzed: śaṅku guṇam śaṅku bhuja vivaram śaṅku bhujayoḥ viśeṣa hṛtam

original: AB_2.15c/ yat labdham sā chāyā jñeyā śaṅkos sva-mūlāt hi//
analyzed: yat labdham sā chāyā jñeyā śaṅkoḥ svamūlāt hi

original: AB_2.16a/ chāyā-guṇitam chāyā-agra-vivaram ūnena bhājitam koṭī/
analyzed: chāyā guṇitam chāyā agra vivaram ūnena bhājitam koṭī

original: AB_2.16c/ śaṅku-guṇā koṭī sā chāyā-bhaktā bhujā @bhavati//
analyzed: śaṅku guṇā koṭī sā chāyā bhaktā bhujā bhavati

original: AB_2.17a/ yas ca eva bhujā-vargas koṭī-vargas ca karṇa-vargas sas/
analyzed: yaḥ ca eva bhujāvargas koṭīvargas ca karṇavargas sas

original: AB_2.17c/ vṛtte śara-saṃvargas %ardha-jyā-vargas sas khalu dhanuṣos//
analyzed: vṛtte śara saṃvargaḥ ardha jyā vargaḥ saḥ khalu dhanuṣoḥ

original: AB_2.18a/ grāsa-ūne %dve vṛtte grāsa-guṇe @bhājayet pṛthaktvena/
analyzed: grāsa ūne dve vṛtte grāsa guṇe bhājayet pṛthaktvena

original: AB_2.18c/ grāsa-ūna-yoga-labdhau saṃpāta-śarau paraspara-tas//
analyzed: grāsa ūna yoga labdhau saṃpāta śarau parasparatas

original: AB_2.19a/ iṣṭam vi-%ekam dalitam sa-pūrvam uttara-guṇam sa-mukham madhyam/
analyzed: iṣṭam viekam dalitam sapūrvam uttaraguṇam samukham madhyam

original: AB_2.19c/ iṣṭa-guṇitam iṣṭa-dhanam tu atha vā ādi-antam pada-%ardha-hatam//
analyzed: iṣṭa guṇitam iṣṭa dhanam tu atha vā ādi antam pada ardha hatam

original: AB_2.20a/ gacchas %aṣṭa-uttara-guṇitāt %dvi-guṇa-ādi-uttara-viśeṣa-varga-yutāt/
AB_2.20c/ mūlam %dvi-guṇa-ādi-ūnam sva-uttara-bhajitam sa-rūpa-ardham//
analyzed: mūlam dviguṇa ādi ūnam sva auttara bhajitam sarūpa ardham

original: AB_2.21a/ %eka-uttara-ādi-upacites gacca-ādi-%eka-uttara-%tri-saṃvargas/
analyzed: ekauttara ādi upaciteḥ gacca ādi ekauttara tri saṃvargaḥ

original: AB_2.21c/ %ṣaṣ-bhaktas sas citi-ghanas sa-%eka-pada-ghanas vi-mūlas vā//
analyzed: ṣaṣ bhaktas sas citi ghanas saeka pada ghanas vimūlas vā

original: AB_2.22a/ sa-%eka-sa-gaccha-padānām kramāt %tri-saṃvargitasya %ṣaṣṭhas aṃśas/
analyzed: sa eka sa ga cha padānām kramāt tri saṃvargitasya ṣaṣṭhas aṃśas

original: AB_2.22c/ varga-citi-ghanas sas @bhavet citi-vargas ghana-citi-ghanas ca//
analyzed: vargacitighanas sas bhavet citivargas ghana citighanas ca

original: AB_2.23a/ samparkasya hi vargāt @viśodhayet eva varga-samparkam/
analyzed: samparkasya hi vargāt viśodhayet eva vargasamparkam

original: AB_2.23c/ yat tasya @bhavati %ardham @vidyāt guṇa-kāra-saṃvargam//
analyzed: yat tasya bhavati ardham vidyāt guṇakārasaṃvargam

original: AB_2.24a/ %dvi-kṛti-guṇāt saṃvargāt %dvi-antara-vargeṇa saṃyutāt mūlam/
analyzed: dvi kṛti guṇāt saṃvargāt dvi antara vargeṇa saṃyutāt mūlam

original: AB_2.24c/ antara-yuktam hīnam tad-guṇa-kāra-%dvayam dalitam//
AB_2.25a/ mūla-phalam sa-phalam kāla-mūla-guṇam %ardha-mūla-kṛti-yuktam/
AB_2.25c/ tad-mūlam mūla-%ardha-ūnam kāla-hṛtam sva-mūla-phalam//
analyzed: tad mūlam mūla ardha ūnam kāla hṛtam sva mūla phalam

original: AB_2.26a/ trairāśika-phala-rāśim tam atha icchā-rāśinā hatam @kṛtvā/
analyzed: trairāśikaphalarāśim tam atha icchārāśinā hatam kṛtvā

original: AB_2.26c/ labdham pramāṇa-bhajitam tasmāt icchā-phalam idam @syāt//
analyzed: labdham pramāṇa bhajitam tasmāt icchā phalam idam syāt

original: AB_2.27a/ chedās paraspara-hatās @bhavanti guṇa-kāra-bhāga-hārāṇām/
analyzed: chedāḥ paraspara hatāḥ bhavanti guṇakāra bhāgahārāṇām

original: AB_2.27c/ cheda-guṇam sa-chedam parasparam tat savarṇatvam//
analyzed: cheda guṇam sa chedam parasparam tat savarṇa tvam

original: AB_2.28a/ guṇa-kārās bhāga-harās bhāga-harās te @bhavanti guṇa-kārās/
analyzed: guṇa kārāḥ bhāga harāḥ bhāga harāḥ te bhavanti guṇa kārāḥ

original: AB_2.28c/ yas kṣepas sas apacayas apacayas kṣepas ca viparīte//
analyzed: yas kṣepas sas apacayas apacayas kṣepas ca viparīte

original: AB_2.29a/ rāśi-ūnam rāśi-ūnam gaccha-dhanam piṇḍitam pṛthaktvena/
analyzed: rāśiūnam rāśiūnam gacchadhanam piṇḍitam pṛthaktvena

original: AB_2.29c/ vi-%ekena padena hṛtam sarva-dhanam tat @bhavati evam//
analyzed: viekena padena hṛtam sarvadhanam tat bhavati evam

original: AB_2.30a/ gulikā-antareṇa @vibhajet %dvayos puruṣayos tu rūpaka-viśeṣam/
analyzed: gulikā antareṇa vibhajet dvayoḥ puruṣayoḥ tu rūpaka viśeṣam

original: AB_2.30c/ labdham gulikā-mūlyam yadi artha-kṛtam @bhavati tulyam//
analyzed: labdham gulikāmūlyam yadi arthakṛtam bhavati tulyam

original: AB_2.31a/ bhakte viloma-vivare gati-yogena anuloma-vivare %dvau/
analyzed: bhakte viloma vivare gati yogena anuloma vivare dvau

original: AB_2.31c/ gati-antareṇa labdhau %dvi-yoga-kālau atīta-aiṣyau//
analyzed: gati antareṇa labdhau dvi yoga kālau atīta aiṣyau

original: AB_2.32a/ adhika-agra-bhāga-hāram @chindyāt ūna-agra-bhāga-hāreṇa/
analyzed: adhika agra bhāgahāram chindyāt ūna agra bhāgahāreṇa

original: AB_2.32c/ śeṣa-paraspara-bhaktam mati-guṇam agra-antare kṣiptam//
analyzed: śeṣa paraspara bhaktam mati guṇam agra antare kṣiptam

original: AB_2.33a/ adhas-upari-guṇitam antya-yuj-ūna-agra-cheda-bhājite śeṣam/
analyzed: adhas u pari guṇitam śeṣam

original: AB_2.33c/ adhika-agra-cheda-guṇam %dvi-cheda-agram adhika-agra-yutam//
analyzed: adhika agra cheda guṇam dvi cheda agram adhika agra yutam

original: kāla-kriyā-pāda
AB 3.1a/ varṣam %dvādaśa-māsās %triṃśat-divasas @bhavet sas māsas tu/
analyzed: ab varṣam dvādaśa māsāḥ triṃśat divasas bhavet saḥ māsaḥ tu

original: AB_3.1c/ %ṣaṣṭis nāḍyas divasas %ṣaṣṭis ca vināḍikā nāḍī//
analyzed: ṣaṣṭis nāḍyas divasas ṣaṣṭis ca vināḍikā nāḍī

original: AB_3.2a/ guru-akṣarāṇi %ṣaṣṭis vināḍikā ārkṣī %ṣaṭ eva vā prāṇās/
analyzed: guruakṣarāṇi ṣaṣṭis vināḍikā ārkṣī ṣaṭ eva vā prāṇās

original: AB_3.2c/ evam kāla-vibhāgas kṣetra-vibhāgas tathā bha-gaṇāt//
analyzed: evam kāla vibhāgaḥ kṣetra vibhāgaḥ tathā bhagaṇāt

original: AB_3.3a/ bha-gaṇās %dvayos %dvayos ye viśeṣa-śeṣās yuge %dvi-yogās te/
analyzed: bhagaṇāḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ ye viśeṣa śeṣāḥ yuge dvi yogāḥ te

original: AB_3.3c/ ravi-śaśi-nakṣatra-gaṇās sammiśrās ca vyatīpātās//
analyzed: ravi śaśi nakṣatra gaṇāḥ sammiśrāḥ ca vyatīpātāḥ

original: AB_3.4a/ sva-ucca-bha-gaṇās sva-bha-gaṇais viśeṣitās sva-ucca-nīca-parivartās/
analyzed: sva aucca bhagaṇāḥ sva bhagaṇaiḥ viśeṣitāḥ sva aucca nīca parivartāḥ

original: AB_3.4c/ guru-bha-gaṇās rāśi-guṇās aśvayuja-ādyās guror abdās//
analyzed: guru bhagaṇāḥ rāśi guṇāḥ aśvayuja ādyāḥ guroḥ abdāḥ

original: AB_3.5a/ ravi-bha-gaṇās ravi-abdās ravi-śaśi-yogās @bhavanti śaśi-māsās/
analyzed: ravi bhagaṇāḥ ravi abdāḥ ravi śaśi yogāḥ bhavanti śaśi māsāḥ

original: AB_3.5c/ ravi-bhū-yogās divasās bha-āvartās ca api nākṣatrās//
analyzed: ravibhūyogās divasās bhaāvartās ca api nākṣatrās

original: AB_3.6a/ adhimāsakās yuge te ravi-māsebhyas adhikās tu ye cāndrās/
analyzed: adhimāsakās yuge te ravimāsebhyas adhikāḥ tu ye cāndrās

original: AB_3.6c/ śaśi-divasās vijñeyās bhū-divasa-ūnās tithi-pralayās//
analyzed: śaśi divasāḥ vijñeyāḥ bhū divasa ūnāḥ tithi pralayāḥ

original: AB_3.7a/ ravi-varṣam mānuṣyam tat api triṃśat-guṇam @bhavati pitryam/
analyzed: ravivarṣam mānuṣyam tat api triṃśatguṇam bhavati pitryam

original: AB_3.7c/ pitryam %dvādaśa-guṇitam divyam varṣam vinirdiṣṭam//
analyzed: pitryam dvādaśaguṇitam divyam varṣam vinirdiṣṭam

original: AB_3.8a/ divyam varṣa-%sahasram graha-sāmānyam yugam %dvi-5ṣaṭka-guṇam/
analyzed: divyam varṣasahasram grahasāmānyam yugam

original: AB_3.8c/ %aṣṭa-uttaram %sahasram brāhmas divasas graha-yugānām//
analyzed: aṣṭauttaram sahasram brāhmas divasas grahayugānām

original: AB_3.9a/ utsarpiṇī yuga-%ardham paścāt apasarpiṇī yuga-%ardham ca/
analyzed: utsarpiṇī yugaardham paścāt apasarpiṇī yugaardham ca

original: AB_3.9c/ madhye yugasya suṣamā ādau ante duṣṣamā indu-uccāt//
analyzed: madhye yugasya suṣamā ādau ante duṣṣamā induuccāt

original: AB_3.10a/ %ṣaṣṭi-abdānām %ṣaṣṭis yadā vyatītās trayas ca yuga-pādās/
analyzed: ṣaṣṭiabdānām ṣaṣṭis yadā vyatītāḥ trayas ca yugapādāḥ

original: AB_3.10c/ %tri-adhikā %viṃśatis abdās tadā iha mama janmanas atītās//
analyzed: tri adhikāḥ viṃśatis abdāḥ tadā iha mama janmanas atītāḥ

original: AB_3.11a/ yuga-varṣa-māsa-divasās samam pravṛttās tu caitra-śukla-ādes/
analyzed: yuga varṣa māsa divasāḥ samam pravṛttāḥ tu caitra śukla ādeḥ

original: AB_3.11c/ kālas ayam anādi-antas graha-bhais @anumīyate kṣetre//
analyzed: kālas ayam anādiantas grahabhaiḥ anumīyate kṣetre

original: AB_3.12a/ %ṣaṣṭyā sūrya-abdānām @prapūrayanti grahās bha-pariṇāham/
analyzed: ṣaṣṭyā sūrya abdānām prapūrayanti grahās bha pariṇāham

original: AB_3.12c/ divyena nabhas-paridhim samam bhramantas sva-kakṣyāsu//
analyzed: divyena nabhasparidhim samam bhramantas svakakṣyāsu

original: AB_3.13a/ maṇḍalam alpam adhastāt kālena alpena @pūrayati candras/
analyzed: maṇḍalam alpam adhastāt kālena alpena pūrayati candras

original: AB_3.13c/ upariṣṭāt sarveṣām mahat ca mahatā śanaiścārī//
analyzed: upariṣṭāt sarveṣām mahat ca mahatā śanaiścārī

original: AB_3.14a/ alpe hi maṇḍale alpā mahati mahāntas ca rāśayas jñeyās/
analyzed: alpe hi maṇḍale alpā mahati mahāntas ca rāśayas jñeyās

original: AB_3.14c/ aṃśās kalās tathā evam vibhāga-tulyās sva-kakṣyāsu//
analyzed: aṃśāḥ kalāḥ tathā evam vibhāga tulyāḥ sva kakṣyāsu

original: AB_3.15a/ bhānām adhas śanaiścara-suraguru-bhauma-arka-śukra-budha-candrās/
analyzed: bhānām adhas śanaiścara sura guru bhauma arka śukra budha candrāḥ

original: AB_3.15c/ eṣām adhas ca bhūmis medhī-bhūtā kha-madhya-sthā//
analyzed: eṣām adhas ca bhūmiḥ medhībhūtā khamadhya sthā

original: AB_3.16a/ %sapta ete horā-īśās śanaiścara-ādyās yathā-kramam śīghrās/
analyzed: sapta ete horāīśās śanaiścaraādyās yathākramam śīghrās

original: AB_3.16c/ śīghra-kramāt %caturthās @bhavanti sūrya-udayāt dinapās//
analyzed: śīghrakramāt caturthās bhavanti sūryaudayāt dinapās

original: AB_3.17a/ kakṣyā-pratimaṇḍala-gās @bhramanti sarve grahās sva-cāreṇa/
analyzed: kakṣyā pratimaṇḍala gāḥ bhramanti sarve grahāḥ sva cāreṇa

original: AB_3.17c/ manda-uccāt anulomam pratilomam ca eva śīghra-uccāt//
analyzed: mandauccāt anulomam pratilomam ca eva śīghrauccāt

original: AB_3.18a/ kakṣyā-maṇḍala-tulyam svam svam pratimaṇḍalam @bhavati eṣām/
analyzed: kakṣyā maṇḍala tulyam svam svam pratimaṇḍalam bhavati eṣām

original: AB_3.18c/ pratimaṇḍalasya madhyam ghana-bhū-madhyāt atikrāntam//
analyzed: prati maṇḍalasya madhyam ghana bhū madhyāt atikrāntam

original: AB_3.19a/ pratimaṇḍala-bhū-vivaram vyāsa-%ardham sva-ucca-nīca-vṛttasya/
AB_3.19c/ vṛtta-paridhau grahās te madhyama-cārāt @bhramanti evam//
analyzed: vṛtta paridhau grahāḥ te madhyamacārāt bhramanti evam

original: AB_3.20a/ yas śīghra-gatis sva-uccāt pratiloma-gatis sva-vṛtta-kakṣyāyām/
analyzed: yaḥ śīghra gatiḥ sva auccāt pratiloma gatiḥ sva vṛtta kakṣyāyām

original: AB_3.20c/ anuloma-gatis vṛtte manda-gatis yas grahas @bhavati//
analyzed: anulomagatis vṛtte mandagatis yas grahas bhavati

original: AB_3.21a/ anuloma-gāni mandāt śīghrāt pratiloma-gāni vṛttāni/
analyzed: anuloma gāni mandāt śīghrāt pratiloma gāni vṛttāni

original: AB_3.21c/ kakṣyā-maṇḍala-lagna-sva-vṛtta-madhye grahas madhyas//
analyzed: kakṣyā maṇḍala lagna sva vṛtta madhye grahaḥ madhyas

original: AB_3.22a/ kṣaya-dhana-dhana-kṣayās @syur manda-uccāt vyatyayena śīghra-uccāt/
analyzed: kṣaya dhana dhana kṣayāḥ syuḥ manda auccāt vyatyayena śīghra auccāt

original: AB_3.22c/ śani-guru-kujeṣu mandāt %ardham ṛṇam dhanam @bhavati pūrve//
analyzed: śani guru kujeṣu mandāt ardham ṛṇam dhanam bhavati pūrve

original: AB_3.23a/ manda-uccāt śīghra-uccāt %ardham ṛṇam dhanam graheṣu mandeṣu/
analyzed: mandauccāt śīghrauccāt ardham ṛṇam dhanam graheṣu mandeṣu

original: AB_3.23c/ manda-uccāt sphuṭa-madhyās śīghra-uccāt ca sphuṭās jñeyās//
AB_3.24a/ śīghra-uccāt %ardha-ūnam kartavyam ṛṇam dhanam sva-manda-ucce/
analyzed: śīghrauccāt ardhaūnam kartavyam ṛṇam dhanam sva mandaucce

original: AB_3.24c/ sphuṭa-madhyau tu bhṛgu-budhau siddhāt mandāt sphuṭau @bhavatas//
analyzed: sphuṭa madhyau tu bhṛgu budhau siddhāt mandāt sphuṭau bhavatas

original: AB_3.25a/ bhū-tārā-graha-vivaram vyāsa-%ardha-hṛtas sva-karṇa-saṃvargas/
analyzed: bhū tārā graha vivaram vyāsa ardha hṛtaḥ sva karṇa saṃvargaḥ

original: AB_3.25c/ kakṣyāyām graha-vegas yas @bhavati sas manda-nīca-ucce//
analyzed: kakṣyāyām grahavegas yas bhavati sas manda nīca aucce

original: gola-pāda
analyzed: golapāda

original: AB 4.1a/ meṣa-ādes kanyā-antam samam udac-apamaṇḍala-%ardham apayātam/
analyzed: ap meṣa ādeḥ kanyā antam samam uda capa maṇḍala ardham apayātam

original: AB_4.1c/ taulya-ādes mīna-antam śeṣa-%ardham dakṣiṇena eva//
analyzed: taulya ādeḥ mīna antam śeṣaardham dakṣiṇena eva

original: AB_4.2a/ tārā-graha-indu-pātās @bhramanti ajasram apamaṇḍale arkas ca/
analyzed: tārāgraha aindupātāḥ bhramanti ajasram apamaṇḍale arkaḥ ca

original: AB_4.2c/ arkāt ca maṇḍala-%ardhe @bhramati hi tasmin kṣiti-chāyā//
analyzed: arkāt ca maṇḍala ardhe bhramati hi tasmin kṣiti chāyā

original: AB_4.3a/ apamaṇḍalasya candras pātāt @yāti uttareṇa dakṣiṇa-tas/
analyzed: apamaṇḍalasya candras pātāt yāti uttareṇa dakṣiṇatas

original: AB_4.3c/ kuja-guru-koṇās ca evam śīghra-uccena api budha-śukrau//
analyzed: kuja guru koṇāḥ ca evam śīghrauccena api budha śukrau

original: AB_4.4a/ candras aṃśais %dvādaśabhis avikṣiptas arka-antara-sthitas dṛśyas/
analyzed: candras aṃśais dvādaśabhis avikṣiptas arka antara sthitas dṛśyas

original: AB_4.4c/ %navabhis bhṛgus bhṛgos tais %dvi-adhikais %dvi-adhikais yathā ślakṣṇās//
analyzed: navabhis bhṛguḥ bhṛgoḥ taiḥ dviadhikaiḥ dviadhikaiḥ yathā ślakṣṇās

original: AB_4.5a/ bhū-graha-bhānām gola-%ardhāni sva-chāyayā vi-varṇāni/
analyzed: bhū graha bhānām gola ardhāni sva chāyayā vivarṇāni

original: AB_4.5c/ %ardhāni yathā-sāram sūrya-abhimukhāni @dīpyante//
analyzed: ardhāni yathāsāram sūrya abhimukhāni dīpyante

original: AB_4.6a/ vṛtta-bha-pañjara-madhye kakṣyā-pariveṣṭitas kha-madhya-gatas/
analyzed: vṛtta bha pañjara madhye kakṣyā pariveṣṭitaḥ kha madhya gataḥ

original: AB_4.6c/ mṛd-jala-śikhi-vāyu-mayas bhū-golas sarvatas vṛttas//
analyzed: mṛd jala śikhi vāyu mayas bhū golas sarvatas vṛttas

original: AB_4.7a/ yad-vat kadamba-puṣpa-granthis pracitas samantatas kusumais/
analyzed: yadvat kadamba puṣpa granthiḥ pracitaḥ samantataḥ kusumaiḥ

original: AB_4.7c/ tad-vat hi sarva-sattvais jala-jais sthala-jais ca bhū-golas//
analyzed: tadvat hi sarva sattvaiḥ jala jaiḥ sthala jaiḥ ca bhūgolas

original: AB_4.8a/ brahma-divasena bhūmes upariṣṭāt yojanam @bhavati vṛddhis/
analyzed: brahmadivasena bhūmes upariṣṭāt yojanam bhavati vṛddhis

original: AB_4.8c/ dina-tulyayā %eka-rātryā mṛd-upacitāyā @bhavati hānis//
analyzed: dina tulyayā eka rātryāḥ mṛd upacitāyāḥ bhavati hāniḥ

original: AB_4.9a/ anuloma-gatis nau-sthas @paśyati acalam viloma-gam yad-vat/
analyzed: anulomagatis nausthas paśyati acalam vilomagam yadvat

original: AB_4.9c/ acalāni bhāni tad-vat sama-paścima-gāni laṅkāyām//
analyzed: acalāni bhāni tadvat sama paścima gāni laṅkāyām

original: AB_4.10a/ udaya-astamaya-nimittam nityam pravaheṇa vāyunā kṣiptas/
analyzed: udaya astamaya nimittam nityam pravaheṇa vāyunā kṣiptaḥ

original: AB_4.10c/ laṅkā-sama-paścima-gas bha-pañjaras sa-grahas @bhramati//
analyzed: laṅkā sama paścima gas bha pañjaras sa grahas bhramati

original: AB_4.11a/ merus yojana-mātras prabhā-karas hima-vatā parikṣiptas/
analyzed: meruḥ yojanamātras prabhākaras himavatā parikṣiptas

original: AB_4.11c/ nandana-vanasya madhye ratna-mayas sarva-tas vṛttas//
analyzed: nandana vanasya madhye ratnamayas sarvatas vṛttas

original: AB_4.12a/ svar-merū sthala-madhye narakas baḍavā-mukham ca jala-madhye/
analyzed: svarmerū sthala madhye narakas baḍavāmukham ca jala madhye

original: AB_4.12c/ amara-marās @manyante parasparam adhas-sthitās niyatam//
analyzed: amaramarāḥ manyante parasparam adhassthitāḥ niyatam

original: AB_4.13a/ udayas yas laṅkāyām sas astamayas savitur eva siddha-pure/
analyzed: udayas yas laṅkāyām sas astamayas savituḥ eva siddhapure

original: AB_4.13c/ madhya-ahnas yama-koṭyām romaka-viṣaye %ardha-rātras @syāt//
analyzed: madhya ahnaḥ yamakoṭyām romaka viṣaye ardharātraḥ syāt

original: AB_4.14a/ sthala-jala-madhyāt laṅkā bhū-kakṣyāyās @bhavet %catur-bhāge/
analyzed: sthala jala madhyāt laṅkā bhūkakṣyāyāḥ bhavet caturbhāge

original: AB_4.14c/ ujjayinī laṅkāyās tad-%catur-aṃśe sama-uttaratas//
analyzed: ujjayinī laṅkāyāḥ tad catur aṃśe

original: AB_4.15a/ bhū-vyāsa-%ardhena ūnam dṛśyam deśāt samāt bha-gola-%ardham/
analyzed: bhūvyāsaardhena ūnam dṛśyam deśāt samāt bhagolaardham

original: AB_4.15c/ %ardham bhūmi-channam bhū-vyāsa-%ardha-adhikam ca eva//
analyzed: ardham bhūmichannam bhūvyāsaardhaadhikam ca eva

original: AB_4.16a/ devās @paśyanti bha-gola-%ardham udac-meru-saṃsthitās savyam/
analyzed: devāḥ paśyanti bhagola ardham udak meru saṃsthitāḥ savyam

original: AB_4.16c/ %ardham tu apasavya-gatam dakṣiṇa-baḍavā-mukhe pretās//
analyzed: ardham tu apasavyagatam dakṣiṇabaḍavāmukhe pretāḥ

original: AB_4.17a/ ravi-varṣa-%ardham devās @paśyanti uditam ravim tathā pretās/
analyzed: ravivarṣaardham devās paśyanti uditam ravim tathā pretāḥ

original: AB_4.17c/ śaśi-māsa-%ardham pitaras śaśi-gās ku-dina-%ardham iha manu-jās//
analyzed: śaśi māsa ardham pitaras śaśigās ku dina ardham iha manujās

original: AB_4.18a/ pūrva-aparam adhas-ūrdhvam maṇḍalam atha dakṣiṇa-uttaram ca eva/
analyzed: pūrva aparam adhasūrdhvam maṇḍalam atha dakṣiṇa auttaram ca eva

original: AB_4.18c/ kṣiti-jam sama-pārśva-stham bhānām yatra udaya-astamayau//
analyzed: kṣitijam samapārśvastham bhānām yatra udayaastamayau

original: AB_4.19a/ pūrva-apara-diś-lagnam kṣiti-jāt akṣa-agrayos ca lagnam yat/
AB_4.19c/ unmaṇḍalam @bhavet tat kṣaya-vṛddhī yatra divasa-niśos//
analyzed: unmaṇḍalam bhavet tat kṣaya vṛddhī yatra divasa niśoḥ

original: AB_4.20a/ pūrva-apara-diś-rekhā adhas ca ūrdhvā dakṣiṇa-uttara-sthā ca/
analyzed: adhas ca ūrdhvā dakṣiṇā auttarasthā ca

original: AB_4.20c/ etāsām sampātas draṣṭā yasmin @bhavet deśe//
analyzed: etāsām sampātas draṣṭā yasmin bhavet deśe

original: AB_4.21a/ ūrdhvam adhastāt draṣṭur jñeyam dṛś-maṇḍalam graha-abhimukham/
analyzed: ūrdhvam adhastāt draṣṭuḥ jñeyam dṛś maṇḍalam graha abhimukham

original: AB_4.21c/ dṛś-kṣepa-maṇḍalam api prāc-lagnam @syāt %tri-rāśi-ūnam//
analyzed: dṛś kṣepa maṇḍalam api prāc lagnam syāt tri rāśi ūnam

original: AB_2.22a/ kāṣṭha-mayam sama-vṛttam samantatas sama-gurum laghum golam/
analyzed: kāṣṭhamayam samavṛttam samantatas samagurum laghum golam

original: AB_4.22c/ pārata-taila-jalais tam @bhramayet sva-dhiyā ca kāla-samam//
AB_4.23a/ dṛś-gola-%ardha-kapāle jyā-%ardhena @vikalpayet bha-gola-%ardham/
analyzed: dṛś gola ardha kapāle jyā ardhena vikalpayet bha gola ardham

original: AB_4.23c/ viṣuvat-jīvā-akṣa-bhujā tasyās tu avalambaks koṭis//
analyzed: tasyāḥ tu koṭis

original: AB_4.24a/ iṣṭa-apakrama-vargam vyāsa-%ardha-kṛtes @viśodhya yat mūlam/
analyzed: iṣṭa apakrama vargam vyāsa ardha kṛteḥ viśodhya yat mūlam

original: AB_4.24c/ viṣuvat-udac-dakṣiṇatas tat ahorātra-%ardha-viṣkambhas//
analyzed: tat ahorātra ardha viṣkambhaḥ

original: AB_4.25a/ iṣṭa-jyā-guṇitam ahorātra-vyāsa-%ardham eva kāṣṭha-antyam/
analyzed: iṣṭa jyā guṇitam ahorātra vyāsa ardham eva kāṣṭha antyam

original: AB_4.25c/ sva-ahorātra-%ardha-hṛtam phalam ajāt laṅkā-udaya-prāc-jyās//
analyzed: sva ahorātra ardha hṛtam phalam ajāt laṅkā udaya prācjyāḥ

original: AB_4.26a/ iṣṭa-apakrama-guṇitām akṣa-jyām lambakena @hṛtvā yā/
analyzed: iṣṭa apakrama guṇitām akṣa jyām lambakena hṛtvā yā

original: AB_4.26c/ sva-ahorātre kṣiti-jā kṣaya-vṛddhi-jyā dina-niśos sā//
analyzed: sva ahorātre kṣiti jā kṣaya vṛddhi jyā dina niśoḥ sā

original: AB_4.27a/ @udayati hi cakra-pādas cara-dala-hīnena divasa-pādena/
analyzed: udayati hi cakra pādaḥ cara dala hīnena divasa pādena

original: AB_4.27c/ %prathamas antyas ca atha anyau tad-sahitena krama-utkramaśas//
analyzed: prathamas antyaḥ ca atha anyau tad sahitena krama autkramaśas

original: AB_4.28a/ sva-ahorātra-iṣṭa-jyā kṣiti-jāt avalambaka-āhatām @kṛtvā/
analyzed: sva ahorātra aiṣṭajyā kṣitijāt avalambaka āhatām kṛtvā

original: AB_4.28c/ viṣkambha-%ardha-vibhakte dinasya gata-śeṣsayos śaṅkus//
analyzed: viṣkambha ardha vibhakte dinasya gata śeṣsayoḥ śaṅkuḥ

original: AB_4.29a/ viṣuvat-jīvā-guṇitas sva-iṣṭas śaṅkus sva-lambakena hṛtas/
AB_4.29c/ astamaya-udaya-sūtrāt dakṣiṇatas sūrya-śaṅku-agram//
analyzed: astamaya audaya sūtrāt dakṣiṇatas sūryaśaṅku agram

original: AB_4.30a/ parama-apakrama-jīvām iṣṭa-jyā-%ardha-āhatām tatas @vibhajet/
analyzed: parama apakrama jīvām iṣṭa jyā ardha āhatām tatas vibhajet

original: AB_4.30c/ jyā lambakena labdhā arka-agrā pūrva-apare kṣiti-je//
analyzed: jyā lambakena labdhā arka agrā pūrva apare kṣitije

original: AB_4.31a/ sā viṣuvat-jyā-ūnā ced viṣuvat-udac-lambakena saṅguṇitā/
analyzed: sā viṣuvat jyā ūnā ced viṣuva tuda clambakena saṅguṇitā

original: AB_4.31c/ viṣuvat-jyayā vibhaktā labdhas pūrva-apare śaṅkus//
analyzed: viṣuvat jyayā vibhaktā labdhaḥ pūrva apare śaṅkuḥ

original: AB_4.32a/ kṣiti-jāt unnata-bhāgānām yā jyā sā paras @bhavet śaṅkus/
analyzed: kṣitijāt unnatabhāgānām yā jyā sā paras bhavet śaṅkus

original: AB_4.32c/ madhyāt nata-bhāga-jyā chāyā śaṅkos tu tasya eva//
analyzed: madhyāt nata bhāga jyā chāyā śaṅkoḥ tu tasya eva

original: AB_4.33a/ madhya-jyā-udaya-jīvā-saṃvarge vyāsa-dala-hṛte yat @syāt/
analyzed: madhya jyā udaya jīvā saṃvarge vyāsadala hṛte yat syāt

original: AB_4.33c/ tad-madhya-jyā-kṛtyos viśeṣa-mūlam sva-dṛś-kṣepas/
AB_4.34a/ dṛś-dṛś-kṣepa-kṛti-viśeṣitasya mūlam sva-dṛś-gatis ku-vaśāt/
analyzed: dṛś dṛś kṣepa kṛti viśeṣitasya mūlam sva dṛś gatiḥ ku vaśāt

original: AB_4.34c/ kṣiti-je svā dṛś-chāyā bhū-vyāsa-%ardham nabhas-madhyāt//
analyzed: kṣiti je svā dṛś chāyā bhū vyāsa ardham nabhas madhyāt

original: AB_4.35a/ vikṣepa-guṇa-akṣa-jyā lambaka-bhaktā @bhavet ṛṇam udac-sthe/
analyzed: vikṣepa guṇa akṣa jyā lambaka bhaktā bhavet ṛṇam udañc sthe

original: AB_4.35c/ udaye dhanam astamaye dakṣiṇa-ge dhanam ṛṇam candre//
analyzed: udaye dhanam astamaye dakṣiṇage dhanam ṛṇam candre

original: AB_4.36a/ vikṣepa-apakrama-guṇam utkramaṇam vistara-%ardha-kṛti-bhaktam/
analyzed: vikṣepa apakrama guṇam utkramaṇam vistara ardha kṛti bhaktam

original: AB_4.36c/ udac-ṛṇa-dhanam udac-ayane dakṣiṇa-ge dhanam ṛṇam yāmye//
analyzed: udacṛṇadhanam udacayane dakṣiṇage dhanam ṛṇam yāmye

original: AB_4.37a/ candras jalam arkas agnis mṛd-bhū-chāyā api yā tamas tat hi/
analyzed: candras jalam arkas agnis mṛdbhūchāyā api yā tamas tat hi

original: AB_4.37c/ @chādayati śaśī sūryam śaśinam mahatī ca bhū-chāyā//
analyzed: chādayati śaśī sūryam śaśinam mahatī ca bhūchāyā

original: AB_4.38a/ sphuṭa-śaśi-māsa-ante arkam pāta-āsannas yadā @praviśati indus/
analyzed: sphuṭa śaśi māsa ante arkam pāta āsannaḥ yadā praviśati indus

original: AB_4.38c/ bhū-chāyām pakṣa-ante tadā adhika-ūnam grahaṇa-madhyam//
analyzed: bhūchāyām pakṣa ante tadā adhika ūnam grahaṇa madhyam

original: AB_4.39a/ bhū-ravi-vivaram @vibhajet bhū-guṇitam tu ravi-bhū-viśeṣeṇa/
analyzed: bhū ravi vivaram vibhajet bhū guṇitam tu ravi bhū viśeṣeṇa

original: AB_4.39c/ bhū-chāyā-dīrghatvam labdham bhū-gola-viṣkambhāt//
analyzed: bhū chāyā dīrgha tvam labdham bhū gola viṣkambhāt

original: AB_4.40a/ chāyā-agra-candra-vivaram bhū-viṣkambheṇa tat samabhyastam/
analyzed: chāyā agra candra vivaram bhū viṣkambheṇa tat samabhyastam

original: AB_4.40c/ bhū-chāyayā vibhaktam @vidyāt tamasas sva-viṣkambham//
analyzed: bhūchāyayā vibhaktam vidyāt tamasas svaviṣkambham

original: AB_4.41a/ tad-śaśi-samparka-%ardha-kṛtes śaśi-vikṣepa-vargitam śodhyam/
AB_4.41c/ sthiti-%ardham asya mūlam jñeyam candra-arka-dina-bhogāt//
analyzed: sthiti ardham asya mūlam jñeyam candra arka dina bhogāt

original: AB_4.42a/ candra-vyāsa-%ardha-ūnasya vargitam yat tamas-maya-%ardhasya/
analyzed: candra vyāsa ardha ūnasya vargitam yat tamasmaya ardhasya

original: AB_4.42c/ vikṣepa-kṛti-vihīnam tasmāt mūlam vimarda-%ardham//
AB_4.43a/ tamasas viṣkambha-%ardham śaśi-viṣkambha-%ardha-varjitam @apohya/
analyzed: tamasaḥ viṣkambha ardham śaśi viṣkambha ardha varjitam apohya

original: AB_4.43c/ vikṣepāt yat śeṣam na @gṛhyate tat śaśāṅkasya//
analyzed: vikṣepāt yat śeṣam na gṛhyate tat śaśāṅkasya

original: AB_4.44a/ vikṣepa-varga-sahitāt sthiti-madhyāt iṣṭa-varjitāt mūlam/
AB_4.44c/ samparka-%ardhāt śodhyam śeṣas tātkālikas grāsas//
AB_4.45a/ madhya-ahna-utkrama-guṇitas akṣas dakṣiṇatas %ardha-vistara-hṛtas dik/
AB_4.45c/ sthiti-%ardhāt ca arka-indvos %tri-rāśi-sahita-ayanāt sparśe//
analyzed: sthiti ardhāt ca arka aindvoḥ tri rāśi sahita ayanāt sparśe

original: AB_4.46a/ pragrahaṇa-ante dhūmras khaṇḍa-grahaṇe śaśī @bhavati kṛṣṇas/
analyzed: pragrahaṇa ante dhūmras khaṇḍa grahaṇe śaśī bhavati kṛṣṇas

original: AB_4.46c/ sarva-grāse kapilas sa-kṛṣṇa-tāmras tamas-madhye//
analyzed: sarva grāse kapilaḥ sa kṛṣṇa tāmraḥ tamaḥ madhye

original: AB_4.47a/ sūrya-indu-paridhi-yoge arka-%aṣṭama-bhāgas @bhavati anādeśyas/
analyzed: sūrya aindu paridhi yoge arka aṣṭamabhāgas bhavati anādeśyas

original: AB_4.47c/ bhānos bhāsvara-bhāvāt su-accha-tanutvāt ca śaśi-paridhes//
analyzed: bhānoḥ bhāsvara bhāvāt su accha tanu tvāt ca śaśiparidheḥ

original: AB_4.48a/ kṣiti-ravi-yogāt dina-kṛt ravi-indu-yogāt @prasādhayet ca indum/
AB_4.48c/ śaśi-tārā-graha-yogāt tathā eva tārā-grahās sarve//
analyzed: śaśi tārā graha yogāt tathā eva tārā grahāḥ sarve

original: AB_4.49a/ sat-asat-jñāna-samudrāt samuddhṛtam brahmaṇas prasādena/
analyzed: sat asat jñāna samudrāt samuddhṛtam brahmaṇas prasādena

original: AB_4.49c/ sat-jñāna-uttama-ratnam mayā nimagnam sva-mati-nāvā//
analyzed: sat jñāna auttamaratnam mayā nimagnam sva mati nāvā

original: AB_4.50a/ āryabhaṭīyam nāmnā pūrvam svāyambhuavam sadā nityam/
analyzed: āryabhaṭīyam nāmnā pūrvam svāyambhuavam sadā nityam

original: AB_4.50c/ su-kṛta-āyuṣos praṇāśam @kurute pratikañcukam yas asya//
analyzed: sukṛtaāyuṣoḥ praṇāśam kurute pratikañcukam yas asya
